title: 3dZipperZapper
description: A basic program to highlight problematic volumes in data sets, especially EPI/DWI data sets with interleaved acquisition.

bad_slice_mask.title: Bad Slice Mask
bad_slice_mask.description: Mask of potentially bad slices across the input dataset.

bad_volumes_list.title: Bad Volumes List
bad_volumes_list.description: 1D file containing a list of the bad volumes.

per_volume_params.title: Per Volume Parameters
per_volume_params.description: 1D file of the per-volume parameters used to detect badness.

calculated_slices.title: Calculated Slices
calculated_slices.description: 1D file of the slices within which calculations were made.

good_volumes_selector.title: Good Volumes Selector
good_volumes_selector.description: Text file with the selector string of *good* volumes.
